Uses of Package
com.autonomy.aci.client.transport

  • Packages that use com.autonomy.aci.client.transport 
    Package Description
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services
    API classes and interfaces for ACI services.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl
    Core implementation of the AciService interface.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport
    API classes and interfaces for ACI transport.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.gss
    Extensions to the core implementation to allow communication with ACI servers using GSS-API.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl
    Core implementation of the AciHttpClient interface.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.util
    Utilities for use with and used by the API.
  • Classes in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport used by com.autonomy.aci.client.services 
    Class and Description
    AciParameter
    Holds the name and value of an ACI parameter to be sent as part of an ACI request.
    AciResponseInputStream
    Provides a wrapper around the actual ACI response InputStream and propagates the content type of the HTTP response.
    AciServerDetails
    Holds connection details about an ACI Server.
  • Classes in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport used by com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl 
    Class and Description
    AciHttpClient
    This interface defines the methods which should be implemented by any class that does the actual communication with an ACI Server.
    AciParameter
    Holds the name and value of an ACI parameter to be sent as part of an ACI request.
    AciResponseInputStream
    Provides a wrapper around the actual ACI response InputStream and propagates the content type of the HTTP response.
    AciServerDetails
    Holds connection details about an ACI Server.
  • Classes in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport used by com.autonomy.aci.client.transport 
    Class and Description
    AciHttpException
    Signals that an HTTP exception has occurred while trying to communicate with an ACI server.
    AciParameter
    Holds the name and value of an ACI parameter to be sent as part of an ACI request.
    AciResponseInputStream
    Provides a wrapper around the actual ACI response InputStream and propagates the content type of the HTTP response.
    AciServerDetails
    Holds connection details about an ACI Server.
    AciServerDetails.TransportProtocol
    Holds the different types of transport protocol that can be used communicate with ACI servers.
    EncryptionCodec
    IDOL Server supports a number of different methods for encrypting ACI actions between itself and the client.
    EncryptionCodecException
    Signals that an exception has occurred while trying to encrypt or decrypt the ACI request or response.
  • Classes in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport used by com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.gss
